originalText.text: My tattoo artist is Anthony, he gets a lot done in a short amount of time. I am in love with the two pieces he has done on me. He is so talented and always brings my ideas to life. The shop has amazing staff who care and constantly check in on you during your session and amazing artist who seek to do their best work.

text.text: My tattoo artist is Anthony, he gets a lot done in a short amount of time. I am in love with the two pieces he has done on me. He is so talented and always brings my ideas to life. The shop has amazing staff who care and constantly check in on you during your session and amazing artist who seek to do their best work.

originalText.text:
I cannot recommend Reena and Lia at Skin Design enough. My SIL and I had a great experience with both of them. This is my second time seeing Reena this year. She is just an incredible artist and I recommend her to people every chance I get. She also touched up a previous tattoo I had gotten by a different artist at a different studio (the smiley face) and made it look even better then when I originally had it done.
Lia did an incredible job with my SIL’s tattoo (the carnation) My SIL has autism and she so appreciated how thorough and in-depth the consultation with Lia was to make her vision come to life. Lia walked her through every step of the process and made her feel very comfortable.
I think Skin Design does a great job at matching up clients with artists that will bring their vision to life. I look forward to visiting them again and referring friends and family to them as well!

text.text:

originalText.text: Truly an amazing experience from start to finish! Lia was the artist who assisted me and she is truly passionate about her craft. She does not rush a single detail and went above and beyond to make my tattoo perfect. The rest of the team is also superb one of the team members would walk around each station during the session and ask if we needed anything and can definitely engage in conversation if someone is new to tattoos and might be nervous which is great. Right before getting my tattoo other team members  checked out the stencil and gave some tweak suggestions and truly gave the piece such an amazing look. Talk about a good vibe and experience. I feel like the team and I have been long time friends and that experience is so hard to find these days. Thank you again Lia and the team at sdt

originalText.text: Amazing shout out to Lia as my tattoo artist! ✨ I got my first tattoo and thank you Lia for making such a fantastic work, it’s the most well done thing I have on me! You made my first tattoo experience a sparkling one and I am so very thankful! ✨ Will definitely come back and looking for her again for my next tattoo! ❤️

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of getting a tattoo from Luis and I can confidently say it was one of the best tattoo experiences I've ever had. From start to finish, Luis was professional, talented, and made me feel completely at ease throughout the entire process.

First and foremost, Luis is an incredibly skilled artist. I had a specific design in mind and he was able to bring it to life even better than I could have imagined. His attention to detail and precision in his work truly sets him apart from other tattoo artists I've been to. I was amazed at how quickly and effortlessly he was able to create such a beautiful and intricate piece.

Aside from his talent, Luis also has a great personality and made me feel comfortable right away. He took the time to explain the process and answer any questions I had. He also made sure I was completely satisfied with the placement and size of the tattoo before starting. I truly appreciated his patience and genuine care for his clients.

The studio itself was clean, organized, and had a welcoming atmosphere. Luis made sure to sanitize all of his equipment and followed all safety protocols, which was very reassuring during these times.

During the tattooing process, Luis made sure I was comfortable and checked in with me regularly. He was also great at distracting me with conversation and making the time go by quickly. Overall, the whole experience was surprisingly painless and enjoyable.

Aftercare instructions were provided in detail and Luis made sure I understood how to properly take care of my new tattoo. He also followed up with me after a few days to see how it was healing and if I had any concerns.

I cannot recommend Luis enough for anyone looking to get a tattoo. His talent, professionalism, and friendly demeanor make for an exceptional tattoo experience. I am beyond happy with my tattoo and will definitely be returning to Luis for any future ink. Gracias por todo, nos veremos para el próximo trabajo!
